title: Gerald McBoing Boing
description: They say it all startedwhen Gerald was two —That’s the age kids start talking—least, most of them do.Well, when he started talking,you know what he said?He didn’t talk words—he went 'boing boing' instead!So goes the hilarious tale of a boy who was a little bit different—a tale that only Dr. Seuss could create. Based on the Academy Award-winning motion picture!
author: Dr. Seuss
